resume_text:
Abhishek Jha
♂phone6289716964 |/envel⌢pejhaa213152@gmail.com |/linkedinlinkedin.com/abhishek |/githubgithub.com/abhishek |/codeleetcode.com/abhishek
Education

Bachelor of Technology (Electronics and Communication Engineering) — 8.1 CGPA Aug 2025
Shree Jain Vidyalaya kolkata
Higher Secondary Education Apr 2021
Hind Motor High School kolkata
Secondary Education Mar 2019
Experience
Twowaits Technologies March 2024 – May 2024
Technical Content Writer Remote
•Conceptualized comprehensive technical content on Data Structures and Algorithms concepts.
•Created dry run pictorial examples to clarify concepts, using different shapes, canvas, and related tools for visual
representation.
•Collaborated with technical writers, editors, and subject matter experts to ensure the accuracy, consistency, and
quality of all written materials.
Projects
Laundry Utility |React Native, React, Express, Firebase, Redux ♂share-square June 2024 – August 2024
•Developed a laundry service platform with payment integration using React Native for the mobile app and React.js
for the website, featuring item selection, address input, date and time scheduling with real-time validation
•Implemented Firebase for authentication and Express for a robust backend
•Used Redux Toolkit for efficient state management and Tailwind CSS to create a responsive, modern UI that
enhances usability and visual appeal
Youtube Sentiment Analysis |Flask, Youtube Data API, React, VADER Library ♂share-square Dec 2023 – Mar 2024
•Implemented a sentiment analysis on YouTube video comments, where users enter a video URL to receive an
analysis of the total number of comments, including positive and negative comments
•Used VADER sentiment analysis to evaluate YouTube comments with 90% accuracy, providing sentiment insights
via the YouTube API
•Built a robust backend using Flask and React.js for the frontend
Background Removerl |React, Removebg API ♂share-square Apr 2023 – June 2023
•Developed a user-friendly React.js interface for automated image background removal, focusing on reusable
components and a robust design, achieving a 90% reduction in background removal errors
•Showcased frontend development and API integration skills with DOM manipulation and React hooks, enhancing
UI engagement and increasing user retention rates by 25%
Skills
Programming : Java, SQL, JavaScript, Python
Development : React Js, React Native, HTML, CSS, Express.js, Firebase, Tailwind CSS
CS Fundamentals : Data Structure & Algorithms, Object Oriented Programming, DBMS, Computer Networks
Accomplishments
Scored 3325 rank out of 34697 in biweekly contest 135.
Solved more than 500 questions on various coding platforms.
Interest & Hobbies
Video Editing
Reading
Cricket

conversation.content:
Hello Abhishek, it's great to meet you.  Thanks for your time.

My first question is about your Laundry Utility project.  Can you tell me a little about the challenges you faced integrating the payment system?

technicalSkills.assessment: Abhishek demonstrates familiarity with a range of technologies, including React Native, React, Express, Firebase, and Redux, as evidenced by his Laundry Utility project.  However, the interview only touched upon the payment integration aspect, leaving the depth of his understanding in these technologies largely unexplored.  His experience as a technical content writer on Data Structures and Algorithms suggests a foundational understanding of computer science concepts. More in-depth technical questions are needed to fully assess his proficiency.

communicationSkills.assessment: Based on the limited interaction, Abhishek's communication appears to be adequate.  The provided snippet doesn't reveal any major communication flaws. However, a more extensive conversation is required to fully assess his clarity, conciseness, and ability to articulate technical concepts effectively to both technical and non-technical audiences.

problemSolvingAbilities.assessment: The interview only elicited a single question about a challenge faced in his project (payment integration).  Without further details on how he addressed this challenge (e.g., debugging strategies, problem decomposition, alternative solutions considered), it is impossible to accurately assess his problem-solving abilities.  His project experience hints at the ability to build a complex application, but further probing is necessary to fully evaluate his problem-solving skills.

culturalFit.assessment: Insufficient information is available to assess cultural fit.  The brief interaction doesn't provide insight into his teamwork, collaboration style, or alignment with company culture.  Further interview rounds involving behavioral questions are recommended.

strengths: Demonstrates experience with multiple technologies (React Native, React, Express, Firebase, Redux).
Possesses technical writing experience, indicating good communication skills.
Has built a moderately complex application (Laundry Utility).
weaknesses: The depth of his technical expertise needs further investigation.
Problem-solving abilities require more thorough evaluation.
Limited information is available on his teamwork and collaboration skills.

overallImpression.assessment: Abhishek presents as a promising candidate with a foundational understanding of relevant technologies and some project experience.  However, the interview was too brief to offer a comprehensive evaluation.  Further assessment is crucial to determine his suitability for the role.

recommendationsForImprovement: Conduct further technical interviews to assess the depth of his knowledge and problem-solving skills.
Ask behavioral questions to gauge cultural fit and teamwork abilities.
Inquire about specific challenges encountered during project development and how they were resolved to evaluate problem-solving approach.
Evaluate his ability to explain complex technical concepts clearly and concisely.
